turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. I'd like to order a few pizzas, please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's a newer pizzeria. Bella Luna, I think's the name.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what type of pizzas did you want to order from there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to need four small pizzas, all of them with gluten-free crust. But could I get two meat lovers, one chicken barbecue and one with just pepperoni and extra cheese?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you said 4 small pizzas, all with gluten free crust, 2 meat lovers, 1 bbq chicken, and 1 with pepperoni and extra cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And how much are those going to be? Yeap, sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $48 is the total for this order. Should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've submitted your order. The food will be ready for pick up in 25 minutes.
